title: 820-3476 no backlight!
message:
Hey guys!

Hoping I can get some tips on where I'm going wrong with this one!

I have a Macbook 820-3476 here that has been dropped and has no backlight!

I'm stuck in general.

PP5V_S0_BKLT_D = 5V 
LCDBKLT_EN_L = 12.6V
VIN_S0SW_LCDBKLT_R = 12.6V
PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT is at 0V which I know means there is a break in the circuit, however I'm unsure of where to start with this.

I've follow the circuit and have 12.6v all the way until I get to Q7700 where I only have 12.6V on pins 4 & 3

I know it's a P type mosfet but I'm lost to why it's not working. 

Can someone help me with my understanding of this, and fill the knowledge gap. 

Thanks, Max

title: 820-3476 no backlight!
message:
Only missing backlight, image present for sure?

Post BKLT_EN_R.
